Zizilivakan (Ziziliveken, Ziliva, Àmzírív), nke a makwaara dị ka Fali nke Jilbu na Ulan Mazhilvən, bụ asụsụ Chad a na-asụ na Cameroon na Far North Province na Nigeria gbara agbata obi
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ọtụtụ mpaghara a na-akpọ Fali.
Zizilivékén na-asụ na Cameroon site na naanị narị mmadụ ole na ole (Crozier na Blench 1992), n'akụkụ ókèala ya na Naijiria
A na-asụ ya n'ebe ọdịda anyanwụ nke Guili (Bourrha commune, Mayo-Tsanaga department, Far North Region)
A na-asụkwa ya na Naijiria gburugburu obodo Jilvu
Na Cameroon, a naghị asụ ya dịka ọ dị na Naịjirịa.
